resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/77240</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660e-63f8-449a-27b8-f0ac155c201a#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Leonardo da Vinci: Önarckép, 1515, Bibliotheca Reale, Torinó, 33x21 cm, vöröskréta rajz.</string>
            <string language="en">Leonardo da Vinci: Self-portrait, 1515, Bibliotheca Reale, Turin, 33x21 cm, red chalk.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leonardo da Vinci: Selbstportrait, 1515, 
Bibliotheca Reale, Turin, 33x21 Zentimeter, rote Kreide.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Da Vinci de Leonardo : art de l'auto-portrait-portrait, 
1515, bibliotheca Reale, Turin, 33x21 centimètre, craie rouge.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Da Vinci de Leonardo: Self-portrait, 1515, 
biblioteca Reale, Turin, 33x21 cm, giz vermelho.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Da Vinci di Leonardo: Self-ritratto, 1515, 
bibliotheca Reale, Torino, 33x21 centimetro, gesso rosso.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Λεοναρδο Da Vinci: Μόνος-πορτρέτο, 
1515, Bibliotheca Reale, Τορίνο, 33x21 εκατ., κόκκινη 
κιμωλία.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Da Vinci de Leonardo: Self-portrait, 1515, 
biblioteca Reale, Turín, 33x21 centímetro, tiza roja.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Leonardo a művészet számos területén óriásit alkotott, így a festészetben is. Önarcképe a korszak sokoldalú művészegyéniségéé.</string>
            <string language="en">Leonardo created colossal works in several fields of art, in painting too. His self-portrait belongs to the many-sided artist's individuality</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Leonardo da Vinci,  művészegyéniség,  önarckép,  16. század,  reneszánsz,  </string>
            <string language="en">Leonardo da Vinci, artist's individuality, self-portrait, 16th century, thge Renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leonardo erstellte colossal Arbeiten in mehreren 
fängt von der kunst auf, wenn sie auch malen. Sein 
Selbstportrait gehört der viel-mit Seiten versehenen Individualität 
des Künstlers</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Leonardo a créé les travaux colossaux dans plusieurs 
domaines d'art, en peignant aussi. Son art de l'auto-portrait-portrait 
appartient à l'individualité de l'artiste beaucoup de-dégrossi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leonardo criou trabalhos colossal em diversos campos da 
arte, em pintar demasiado. Seu self-portrait pertence ao 
individuality do artista muito-tom o partido</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Leonardo ha creato gli impianti colossal in parecchi campi
dell'arte, nella verniciatura anche. Il suo self-ritratto 
appartiene all'individualità dell'artista molto-parteggiato</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Leonardo δημιούργησε τις κολοσσιαίες εργασίες σε 
διάφορα πεδία της τέχνης, να χρωματίσει επίσης. Το 
μόνος-πορτρέτο του ανήκει στην προσωπικότητα του πολύπλευρου 
καλλιτέχνη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Leonardo creó trabajos colosales en varios campos del 
arte, en pintar también. Su self-portrait pertenece a la 
individualidad del artista mucho-echado a un lado</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leonardo da Vinci, Individualität des Künstlers, 
Selbstportrait, 16. Jahrhundert, thge Renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Da Vinci, l'individualité de l'artiste, 
art de l'auto-portrait-portrait, 16ème siècle, la Renaissance de Leonardo de 
thge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Da Vinci de Leonardo, individuality do artista, 
self-portrait, 1õ século, renascimento do thge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Da Vinci, individualità dell'artista, self-ritratto, 
sedicesimo secolo, rinascita di Leonardo del thge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Λεοναρδο Da Vinci, προσωπικότητα του καλλιτέχνη, 
μόνος-πορτρέτο, 16$ος αιώνας, thge αναγέννηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Da Vinci, individualidad del artista, self-portrait, 
décimosexto siglo, renacimiento de Leonardo del thge</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
